_header: Jesu was of Mary born / For sinful man that was forlorn
_description: A Dialogue between Christ and Man — 76 lines in couplets

BLAdd31042.First Lines: Ihesu was of Mary borneffor Synfull man þat was forlorne…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …that we may when we hethyn wendeCome to þi Ioye with owtten ende
BLAdd31042.Note: Ends, “Amen Amen Per charite Amen Amen.”

BLCottVesAIII.First Lines:
Ihesu o maria bornfor sinful man þat was for
                    lorn…
BLCottVesAIII.Last Lines:
…þat we mai quen we heþen wendCum to þi ioi wit
                    vten end

GottingenTheo107.First Lines:
Ihesu of mari bornfor sinful man þat was for
                    lorn…
GottingenTheo107.Last Lines:
…langage of þe norþeren ledeþat can nan
                    oþer englis rede

KeioHopton.First Lines:
Ihesus was of mary borne for synfulle man þat was
                    forlorne…
KeioHopton.Last Lines:
…And so owre mys here for to amendyn in lestande lyfe þat
                    we may lende
KeioHopton.Note:
Seventy-four lines written two lines of verse per line of manuscript,
                    signed ‘Amen quod Hall’ (f. 13v).

TokyoTak15.First Lines:
Ihesu of mari þat was borneffor synfull man þat was
                    forlorne…
TokyoTak15.Last Lines:
…þat we may when we bethen wendeCome to þe ioy with
                    owten ende
TokyoTak15.Attributed Title:
Bona meditatio de bonitate domini nostri ihesu cristi (f.
                        83vb)
